title: Learning Design and Analysis for Quality Evaluation of Online Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Ability to use basic online learning functions and understanding of foundational math concepts
context.additional_context: Quality assessment and improvement of remote mathematics education in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can classify types of learning activities (interaction, feedback, others) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze and evaluate at least three learning design quality indicators using the E-Design Assessment Tool (eDAT).
Learners can explain at least two correlations between learning analytics data, course retention rates, and achievement outcomes.
Learners can design at least five interaction and feedback activities suitable for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
